title: Language Practice Test 1
intro_text:
Language

Welcome to the Language Initial Practice Test!

This is a quick test to see how prepared you are for the language portion of the GED® Reasoning Through Language Arts test. We'll use your results to help create your learning plan and make recommendations as you move through the course.

Take your time with this test. If you don't know how to answer a question, leave it blank and go on to the next question. Guessing is a good idea on the GED® test, but for this test, we really want to understand what you know. If you are unsure of an answer and want to think about it, you can click “Review Question Later” to come back to the question later.

There are 15 questions on the test. These questions will give you practice with the types of questions you will see on the GED® test and help us generate a study plan for what you need to brush up on for the test.

Relax and do your best!
